dublin_core.dcvalue: Sub optimal accrual rates to adult oncology clinical trials have been reported One potential accrual barrier has been the step of identifying potential clinical trials for patients In order to partially address this barrier a clinical trial listing was developed for oncologists to use on their personal digital assistants PDAs Preliminary feedback was gathered from an initial group of physicians who accessed this resource Benefits of this approach as well as future enhancements are discussed
AMIA ... Annual Symposium proceedings / AMIA Symposium. AMIA Symposium
Providing PDA-based clinical trial listings to oncologists.
